title: Where Have All The Cowboys Gone
description: "You were and still are the best thing that's ever happened to me."Heir to a Texas dynasty, rancher Hayden Courtland has everything except children. He'd planned on having that family with his beautiful Navajo wife, but she crushed his dreams to chase hers in Hollywood. There's not enough whiskey in Texas to numb the pain, especially when she walks through his door...Actress Alana Marlow desperately wants to right a terrible wrong. But she's haunted by the past and targeted by one man's obsession. She'll have to fight them both if she wants to win back her Cowboy's trust and protect the one thing he always wanted.Stand alone novel that is a sister novel to Josey's Mountain. The Marlow family saga continues.
author: Elle Marlow
